landing.heroBody: Fully integrated with GitHub, Locale Studio is the simplest way to manage the text (copy and translations) of your website / mobile app.
landing.bodyText1: Clients and translators who are looking for a faster and cheaper way to update copy and see their changes in situ, without needing to go through the development team.
landing.bodyText2: Project managers and developers who are looking for an easier solution to leave all copy and translation updates to the client after the initial set up.

permissionModal.modalDescription: Studio Locale would like to access your Google Drive. See our privacy policy for more details.

cloneModal.modalDescription: You can quickly set up a fresh template by following these steps:
cloneModal.listItemSecondary1: You'll be asked to authorise access to your Google Drive, so we can add a copy of our template there
cloneModal.listItemPrimary2: Locate the Sheet in your Google Drive
cloneModal.listItemSecondary2: A Google Sheet titled 'Copy of Template Sheet for Translations' will appear in your Google Drive
cloneModal.listItemSecondary3: Once you've cloned the template, it is ready to add to your Studio Locale project
